p: More recently, geranylgeranyltranseferase inhibitors (GGTIs) were developed. Ras protein isoforms were found to be geranylgeranylated when FTase was inhibited and some pathways downstream Ras were mediated by geranylgeranylated proteins [ 191]. In cell and animal models, GGTIs block cell cycle in the G1 phase [ 192], induce apoptosis, and inhibit tumor cell growth [ 180].
